original_text: When Esther’s eunuchs and female attendants came and told her about Mordecai, she was in great distress. She sent clothes for him to put on instead of his sackcloth, but he would not accept them.
korean_text: 에스더의 시녀와 내시가 나아와 전하니 왕후가 매우 근심하여 입을 의복을 모르드개에게 보내어 그 굵은 베 옷을 벗기고자 하나 모르드개가 받지 아니하는지라

sentences.original_text: When Esther's eunuchs and female attendants came

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀에게 모르드개에 대해 알렸을 때

sentences.original_text: She sent clothes for him to put on
but he would not accept them
